title: Boards level not synced to summoner level

replies.body: Poro squad here to help.....oh....looks like posting here actually synced up your levels for you automatically! Posting here in H&S will push through a sync, but using the [**Profile Syncing Tool**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/fos1aFEB-boards-profile-syncing-tool) should work as well if it ever happens again.
